mapper.select: select ifnull(sum(l.learnLong),0) from (select * from sys_testpaper where examsStartTime>=date_add(curdate(),INTERVAL -1 year) and testStatus='发布') t inner join sys_learnduration l on t.id=l.t_id ${ew.customSqlSegment}

select count(l.res_id) from (select * from sys_testpaper where examsStartTime>=date_add(curdate(),INTERVAL -1 year) and testStatus='发布') t inner join sys_learnduration l on t.id=l.t_id ${ew.customSqlSegment}

select r.id materialID,r.resourceType materialType,r.resourceName materialName,r.url materialURL,t.id examID,t.testName examName,t.testCount examNum,t.imgUrl materialImg,t.updateTime publishDate, studyTimes,studyDuration ,examTimes,maxScores ,last.score lastScores from (select * from sys_testpaper where examsStartTime>=date_add(curdate(),INTERVAL -1 year) and testStatus='发布') t inner join sys_resourceinfo r on t.res_id=r.id inner join (select t_id,emp_code,res_id,count(res_id) studyTimes,sum(learnLong) studyDuration from sys_learnduration group by t_id,emp_code,res_id) u on r.id=u.res_id inner join (select t_id,emp_code, count(t_id) examTimes,max(score) maxScores from sys_testresult group by t_id,emp_code) tr on tr.t_id=t.id inner join (select * from sys_testresult order by testTime desc limit 1) last on last.t_id=t.id ${ew.customSqlSegment}

select d.resourceName,b.employeeName,c.deptname deptName,a.learnTimes,a.learnLong from ( select res_id,emp_code,count(*) learnTimes,sum(learnLong) learnLong from sys_learnduration where learnTime>=date_add(now(),interval -1 year) group by res_id,emp_code) a INNER JOIN sys_employee b on a.emp_code=b.employeeCode INNER JOIN sys_dept c on c.id=b.dept_id INNER JOIN sys_resourceinfo d on d.id=a.res_id ${ew.customSqlSegment}
